proposedChanges.value: Place a concise headline and subheadline in the hero section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Enhances clarity and quickly communicates the main value proposition.
risks: May not capture all product details

proposedChanges.value: Move the trust section above the problem statement.
proposedChanges.rationale: Builds trust early, increasing engagement with the rest of the page.
risks: Trust section may overshadow initial value

proposedChanges.value: Add a prominent 'Get Started' button in the hero section.
proposedChanges.rationale: Directs user action immediately, increasing conversion likelihood.
risks: Might be overlooked if not emphasized

proposedChanges.value: Incorporate customer testimonials and logos of trusted partners.
proposedChanges.rationale: Strengthens trust by leveraging third-party endorsements.

proposedChanges.value: Include a section on data protection and privacy.
proposedChanges.rationale: Addresses security concerns, enhancing user confidence.
risks: Could interrupt flow if too lengthy

proposedChanges.value: Simplify pricing layout with clear tiers and benefits.
proposedChanges.rationale: Improves understanding, making it easier for users to choose a plan.

proposedChanges.value: Implement a sticky 'Sign Up Now' CTA on scroll.
proposedChanges.rationale: Keeps the call-to-action visible, increasing conversion potential.
risks: Can be distracting if too intrusive

proposedChanges.value: Ensure all CTAs are easily tappable and visible on mobile devices.
proposedChanges.rationale: Facilitates user interaction and conversion on smaller screens.
